node.statement: DE BRUIJN IDENTITY (RIGOROUS): Prove dS/dt = Phi_n(p_t) where S(p) = sum_{i<j} log|lambda_i - lambda_j| is the log-Vandermonde entropy and p_t = p boxplus G_t is Gaussian smoothing. The root dynamics are dr_i/dt = H_p(r_i) (Dyson Brownian motion drift). Then dS/dt = sum_{i<j} (dr_i/dt - dr_j/dt)/(r_i - r_j) = sum_{i<j} (H(r_i)-H(r_j))/(r_i-r_j). This equals Phi_n by the identity Phi_n = 2*Sm2 = sum_i H_i^2 (via triple identity). Validated numerically in ex7.
